name: Bot Defense (matthewi)
description:
Important: Requires 1-3 compatible controllers to play!  

Controls: Three players control different parts of the bot. 

Turrets (Player 1): 

-Rotate left & right turret using left & right sticks

-Shoot left & right turrets using left & right sticks 

Top legs (Player 2) & Bottom legs (Player 3):

-Lift and lower left & right legs with left & right trigger 

-Move lifted leg with sticks

Defend your bot with up to 2 friends! Survive waves of enemy drones while working together. 

Made by Matthew, Juan, Aylin, Riggy, Alina, and Zannie!

Full list of task delegations and list of assets used can be found here: 

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1j8lJbsovxmKjcvT28Iyjl2W2xmkAq695GyPovKtzimg/...

Submission for DATT 4300, Game Development II.
